content.content: 1. The following forms provided by the Attorney General are prescribed: 1. “Form 1: Request for a Copy of a Youth Criminal Justice Act (Canada) Sentence Order”, dated April 9, 2003, for the purpose of clause 11 (a) of the Act, to be used for requests under paragraph 119 (1) (r) of the Youth Criminal Justice Act (Canada). 2. “Form 2: Notice About Evidence Obtained under the Youth Criminal Justice Act (Canada)”, dated April 9, 2003, for the purpose of subsection 3 (4) of the Act. O. Reg. 212/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following forms provided by the Attorney General are prescribed:

1. “Form 1: Request for a Copy of a Youth Criminal Justice Act (Canada) Sentence Order”, dated April 9, 2003, for the purpose of clause 11 (a) of the Act, to be used for requests under paragraph 119 (1) (r) of the Youth Criminal Justice Act (Canada).

2. “Form 2: Notice About Evidence Obtained under the Youth Criminal Justice Act (Canada)”, dated April 9, 2003, for the purpose of subsection 3 (4) of the Act. O. Reg. 212/03, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 212/03, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 212/03, s. 2.

Français
